mapper.select: /* snippBbs.getDetail */ SELECT SB.UID AS BBS_UID ,SB.BBS_TP ,SB.BBS_NM ,SB.USE_AT ,SB.DELETE_AT ,SB.REG_UID ,SB.REG_DT ,SU_REG.USER_ID AS REG_ID ,SB.UPDT_UID ,SB.UPDT_DT ,SU_UPDT.USER_ID AS UPDT_ID FROM SNP_BBS SB LEFT JOIN SNP_USER SU_REG ON SU_REG.UID = SB.REG_UID LEFT JOIN SNP_USER SU_UPDT ON SU_UPDT.UID = SB.UPDT_UID WHERE SB.UID = #{uid}
/* snippBbs.view */ SELECT UID ,BBS_TP ,BBS_NM ,USE_AT FROM SNP_BBS WHERE UID = #{uid}
/* snippBbs.getRecentBbs */ SELECT UID ,BBS_TP ,BBS_NM ,USE_AT FROM SNP_BBS WHERE USE_AT = 'Y' AND BBS_TP = #{bbsTp} ORDER BY REG_DT DESC LIMIT 1
